00021 #pragma once
00022 #include "./mesh_tools.hpp"
00023 namespace triqs {
00024 namespace gfs {
00025 
00026  // Three possible meshes
00027  enum mesh_kind {
00028   half_bins,
00029   full_bins,
00030   without_last
00031  };
00032 
00036  template <typename Domain> struct linear_mesh {
00037 
00038   using domain_t = Domain;
00039   using index_t = long;
00040   using domain_pt_t = typename domain_t::point_t;
00041 
00042   static_assert(!std::is_base_of<std::complex<double>, domain_pt_t>::value,
00043                 "Internal error : can not use Linear Mesh in this case");
00044 
00045   linear_mesh() : _dom(), L(0), a_pt(0), b_pt(0), xmin(0), xmax(0), del(0), meshk(half_bins) {}
00046 
00047   explicit linear_mesh(domain_t dom, double a, double b, long n_pts, mesh_kind mk)
00048      : _dom(std::move(dom)), L(n_pts), a_pt(a), b_pt(b), meshk(mk) {
00049    switch (mk) {
00050     case half_bins:
00051      del = (b - a) / L;
00052      xmin = a + 0.5 * del;
00053      break;
00054     case full_bins:
00055      del = (b - a) / (L - 1);
00056      xmin = a;
00057      break;
00058     case without_last:
00059      del = (b - a) / L;
00060      xmin = a;
00061      break;
00062    }
00063    xmax = xmin + del * (L - 1);
00064   }
00065 
00066   domain_t const &domain() const { return _dom; }
00067   long size() const { return L; }
00068   double delta() const { return del; }
00069   double x_max() const { return xmax; }
00070   double x_min() const { return xmin; }
00071   mesh_kind kind() const { return meshk; }
00072 
00074   domain_pt_t index_to_point(index_t ind) const { return xmin + ind * del; }
00075 
00076   public:
00077   long index_to_linear(index_t ind) const { return ind; }
00078 
00080   class mesh_point_t : tag::mesh_point, public utility::arithmetic_ops_by_cast<mesh_point_t, domain_pt_t> {
00081    linear_mesh const *m;
00082    index_t _index;
00083 
00084    public:
00085    mesh_point_t() : m(nullptr) {}
00086    mesh_point_t(linear_mesh const &mesh, index_t const &index_) : m(&mesh), _index(index_) {}
00087    mesh_point_t(linear_mesh const &mesh) : mesh_point_t(mesh,0) {}
00088    void advance() { ++_index; }
00089    using cast_t = domain_pt_t;
00090    operator cast_t() const { return m->index_to_point(_index); }
00091    long linear_index() const { return _index; }
00092    long index() const { return _index; }
00093    bool at_end() const { return (_index == m->size()); }
00094    void reset() { _index = 0; }
00095   };
00096 
00098   mesh_point_t operator[](index_t i) const {
00099    return {*this, i};
00100   }
00101 
00102   public:
00104   using const_iterator = mesh_pt_generator<linear_mesh>;
00105   const_iterator begin() const { return const_iterator(this); }
00106   const_iterator end() const { return const_iterator(this, true); }
00107   const_iterator cbegin() const { return const_iterator(this); }
00108   const_iterator cend() const { return const_iterator(this, true); }
00109 
00111   bool operator==(linear_mesh const &M) const {
00112    return ((_dom == M._dom) && (size() == M.size()) && (std::abs(xmin - M.xmin) < 1.e-15) && (std::abs(xmax - M.xmax) < 1.e-15));
00113   }
00114   bool operator!=(linear_mesh const &M) const { return !(operator==(M)); }
00115 
00117   friend void h5_write(h5::group fg, std::string subgroup_name, linear_mesh const &m) {
00118    h5::group gr = fg.create_group(subgroup_name);
00119    int k;
00120    switch (m.meshk) {
00121     case half_bins:
00122      k = 0;
00123      break;
00124     case full_bins:
00125      k = 1;
00126      break;
00127     case without_last:
00128      k = 2;
00129      break;
00130    }
00131    h5_write(gr, "domain", m.domain());
00132    h5_write(gr, "min", m.a_pt);
00133    h5_write(gr, "max", m.b_pt);
00134    h5_write(gr, "size", m.size());
00135    h5_write(gr, "kind", k);
00136   }
00137 
00139   friend void h5_read(h5::group fg, std::string subgroup_name, linear_mesh &m) {
00140    h5::group gr = fg.open_group(subgroup_name);
00141    typename linear_mesh::domain_t dom;
00142    double a, b;
00143    long L;
00144    int k;
00145    mesh_kind mk;
00146    h5_read(gr, "domain", dom);
00147    h5_read(gr, "min", a);
00148    h5_read(gr, "max", b);
00149    h5_read(gr, "size", L);
00150    h5_read(gr, "kind", k);
00151    switch (k) {
00152     case 0:
00153      mk = half_bins;
00154      break;
00155     case 1:
00156      mk = full_bins;
00157      break;
00158     case 2:
00159      mk = without_last;
00160      break;
00161    }
00162    m = linear_mesh(std::move(dom), a, b, L, mk);
00163   }
00164 
00165   //  BOOST Serialization
00166   friend class boost::serialization::access;
00167   template <class Archive> void serialize(Archive &ar, const unsigned int version) {
00168    ar &TRIQS_MAKE_NVP("domain", _dom);
00169    ar &TRIQS_MAKE_NVP("a_pt", a_pt);
00170    ar &TRIQS_MAKE_NVP("b_pt", b_pt);
00171    ar &TRIQS_MAKE_NVP("xmin", xmin);
00172    ar &TRIQS_MAKE_NVP("xmax", xmax);
00173    ar &TRIQS_MAKE_NVP("del", del);
00174    ar &TRIQS_MAKE_NVP("size", L);
00175    ar &TRIQS_MAKE_NVP("kind", meshk);
00176   }
00177 
00178   friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &sout, linear_mesh const &m) { return sout << "Linear Mesh of size " << m.L; }
00179 
00180   private:
00181   domain_t _dom;
00182   long L;
00183   double a_pt, b_pt, xmin, xmax, del;
00184   mesh_kind meshk;
00185  };
00186 
00187 
00188  // UNUSED, only in deprecated code...
00190  template <typename D> long get_closest_mesh_pt_index(linear_mesh<D> const &mesh, typename D::point_t const &x) {
00191   double a = (x - mesh.x_min()) / mesh.delta();
00192   return std::floor(a);
00193  }
00194 
00196  template <typename D> std::tuple<bool, long, double> windowing(linear_mesh<D> const &mesh, typename D::point_t const &x) {
00197   double a = (x - mesh.x_min()) / mesh.delta();
00198   long i = std::floor(a), imax = long(mesh.size()) - 1;
00199   bool in = (i >= 0) && (i < imax);
00200   double w = a - i;
00201   if (i == imax) {
00202    --i;
00203    in = (std::abs(w) < 1.e-12);
00204    w = 1.0;
00205   }
00206   if (i == -1) {
00207    i = 0;
00208    in = (std::abs(1 - w) < 1.e-12);
00209    w = 1.0;
00210   }
00211   return std::make_tuple(in, i, w);
00212   // return std::make_tuple(in, (in ? i : 0),w);
00213  }
00214 }
00215 }
